      • timePlayPropertyProperty

        public javafx.beans.property.SimpleFloatProperty timePlayPropertyProperty()

      • getBotSpeedHorizontal

        public double getBotSpeedHorizontal()
        returns scaled bot speed depending on game window size* game mode contains a number which represents how much % of map height/width bot travels in 1 sec. bot's Block is drawn if 60fps, so in order to scale that speed I'm dividing mentioned number by 60 and converting percentage to a fraction by dividing by 100 (60*100 = 6000)

      • getBotSpeedVertical

        public double getBotSpeedVertical()
        returns scaled bot speed depending on game window size* game mode contains a number which represents how much % of map height/width bot travels in 1 sec. bot's Block is drawn if 60fps, so in order to scale that speed I'm dividing mentioned number by 60 and converting percentage to a fraction by dividing by 100 (60*100 = 6000)

      • getPlayerSpeedHorizontal

        public double getPlayerSpeedHorizontal()
        returns scaled players speed depending on game window size

      • getPlayerSpeedVertical

        public double getPlayerSpeedVertical()
        returns scaled players speed depending on game window size
